description: Lists all files in a directory and sends their paths to the bot along with a message.

args.name: workingDirectory
args.description: The working directory (eg. project or repository)

args.name: subDirectory
args.description: The directory to list files from. This must be relative to the working directory.

args.name: message
args.description: The message to send to the bot, such as asking it for identify which file to use for a task.
